message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I think this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than I can accept. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.
